pullRequest.body:
The set `{x | p x}` belongs to `f` iff `∀ s, {x | x ∈ s → p x} ∈ f`. Specialization for `EventuallyEq` and `Eventually.LE`.

Suggested by @urkud.

---
<!-- The text above the `---` will become the commit message when your
PR is merged. Please leave a blank newline before the `---`, otherwise
GitHub will format the text above it as a title.

To indicate co-authors, include lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Co-authored-by: Author Name <author@email.com>

Any other comments you want to keep out of the PR commit should go
below the `---`, and placed outside this HTML comment, or else they
will be invisible to reviewers.

If this PR depends on other PRs, please list them below this comment,
using the following format:
- [ ] depends on: #abc [optional extra text]
- [ ] depends on: #xyz [optional extra text]
-->

nodes.body: My apologies that this PR went under the radar for so long. An automated check was failing for no good reason. @grunweg created some infrastructure to catch such cases in the future: https://jcommelin.github.io/queueboard/help_out.html#inessential-CI-fails

Pull request successfully merged into master.

Build succeeded:
  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/11984060008/job/33414379622)
  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/11984060008/job/33414379516)
Sorry for the delay here. This looks sensible to me; just some formatting comments.

```suggestion
    f ≤ᶠ[l] g ↔ ∀ s : Set α, ∀ᶠ x in l, x ∈ s → f x ≤ g x :=
```

```suggestion
    f =ᶠ[l] g ↔ ∀ s : Set α, ∀ᶠ x in l, x ∈ s → f x = g x :=
```

This is quite hard to read with all the brackets, so I'd recommend:
```suggestion
    (∀ᶠ x in f, p x) ↔ ∀ s : Set α, ∀ᶠ x in f, x ∈ s → p x where
  mp h _ := by filter_upwards [h] with _ pa _ using pa
  mpr h := by filter_upwards [h univ] with _ pa using (pa (by simp))
```
Oh nice, I did not know we could do that!

```suggestion
  mp h _ := by filter_upwards [h] with _ pa _ using pa
  mpr h := by filter_upwards [h univ] with _ pa using pa (by simp)
```

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - feat(Order/Filter/Basic): eventually_iff_all_subsets and specializations
